channel.title: Dead Noble forced accusation instead of death prediction
channel.description:
#### What happened? I was dead as a Noble, tried to predict who would die at night, it forced them to accuse themselves
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I was supposed to predict their death #### Steps to reproduce: Be a dead Noble and try to predict someone's death, happened first day after I died (I bled out) #### Comments:
